lines.text: Three days. So much can happen to the human heart in three days. It beats 239,000 times in three days. It can break, it can be torn apart... but it just keeps on beating and beating.
Some famous male writer once wrote, "You can't sleep with all the women in the world, but you must try!" That pretty much sums up the attitude of every man I've ever known... except my daddy.
Sometimes life is like a country and western song.
